job_title: Coordinator of Programming in Bay Village, OH
pros: I love that I am able to work remotely. The staff and volunteers are all wonderful people to work with. Transparent communication is also great. When I was needed in office, I got to bring my infant with me to work, as I was breastfeeding.
cons: This is a new position for the company, so it isn’t always clear who does what. The company also heavily relies on volunteers and college students, which can mean working during unexpected hours to accommodate their schedules.

pros: Remote work available Travel perks Clothing stipend
cons: Minimum wage payment Lack of consistent communication with supervisor as meetings would get cancelled often
